Flint.Richfield Public School Academy: Richfield Public School Academy is a free, public charter school located in Flint, Michigan formerly managed by Mosaica Education but now self managed by the Richfield Board of Directors. It offers grades 3–8 at the main building and a Montessori pre-school program off-site. Grades K-2 are located at Richfield Early Learning Center at 4358 Richfield Road in Flint.
